<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="test">60ffb85d1bb54010cad7da49cc4bcb5d</child><cloned>2019-12-17 12:40:07</cloned><last_validated>2019-12-17 12:40:07</last_validated><parent display_value="Hello World 1">6f2cff80d721120023c84f80de61033c</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category/><client_script><![CDATA[function() {	
	var c = this;		
  c.display = function() {		
		c.data.message = (c.data.sometext) ? 'Hello ' + c.data.sometext + '!' : '';
	}
	
	c.display();
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>h1 {
color: #428bca;
}</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data>{
